name: GHOST-OFFICIAL-V1
description: An advanced, futuristic WhatsApp bot by RAK for the RAK Realm ecosystem.

RAK_SESSION.description: Your WhatsApp session data. Keep this secure.

PREFIX.description: Bot command prefix. Use / for the new RAK style.

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. Options: EN, UR, HI, AR.

SUDO_USERS.description: Admin users (comma-separated numbers with country code). Example: 923123456789,919876543210

ALLOWED_JIDS.description: JIDs allowed to use the bot (comma-separated). Leave empty for public.

BLOCKED_JIDS.description: JIDs blocked from using the bot (comma-separated).

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level. Options: error, warn, info, debug.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Required for Heroku. Your Heroku app name.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Required for Heroku. Your Heroku API key.

VC_MODE.description: Default state for Voice Command Mode. (on/off)
